name: Fikko
description:
Our main character is Fikko (Fiko). Accompany this nice lizard (If lizard is not a toad!) In the search for food, you must make precise jumps and dodge enemies and their shots.

CHARACTERISTICS
- Overcome TEN infested levels of porcupines, demons that throw fire and ghosts that will chase you to exhaustion in the depth of the sinister night.
- PLAY FREE with advertising.
- KEEP YOUR PARTIES. Save your progress at the end of each level.
- GET BONUSES. Some insects will give you some special effect (Stellar protection and extra speed)
- STORE INSECT JUICE. You can store jars and use them during the game, these will give you ESTELAR PROTECTION and EXTRA SPEED.
- LUCIERNAGAS, LIBELULAS AND BEETLES. These are the insects that we will find at night.
